lead_paragraph: SLOAN--Howard. The Board of Trustees and staff of New York Blood Center (NYBC) mourn the loss of our longtime trustee, Howard Sloan. Howard, who joined our board in 1977 and served as Chairman from 1993-2001, was an intelligent, insightful leader who remained an active member of the NYBC Board of Trustees until his death. Through his steadfast vision, he helped keep NYBC at the forefront of public health in the New York metropolitan area for many years. In addition to his devotion and leadership, Howard was also a generous supporter of our lifesaving work. His friendship, leadership, great sense of humor, and contributions to our mission will not be forgotten. Howard P. Milstein, Chairman Christopher D. Hillyer, M.D., President and CEO 1/3
